channel.title: Need help with error
channel.description:
[code]Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models.. Loading animations Loaded the flo. 602 NPC Amount: 11257 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Model.<init>(Model.java:1080) at EntityDef.method164(EntityDef.java:452) at NPC.method450(NPC.java:21) at NPC.getRotatedModel(NPC.java:28) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1436) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1036) at client.method146(client.java:15191) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10221) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11145) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6247) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722) [/code]
then i got this error [code]Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: GC overhead limit exc eeded at Class36.load(Class36.java:160) at Class36.method531(Class36.java:186) at Model.method470(Model.java:1608) at RSInterface.method209(RSInterface.java:5571) at client.drawInterface(client.java:10670) at client.drawChatArea(client.java:687) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:10267) at client.processDrawing(client.java:11145) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:6247) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:722)[/code]

item.title: Need help with error
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

OutOfMemoryError

You don’t have enough memory to execute them.
Check the run.bats for them and lower the -Xmx and if there is a -Xms lower it as well
Xms = minimal memory used.
Xmx = max memory used.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with error
item.dc:creator: @dreamedsoul dreamedsoul
item.description:

Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded Compressed Models..
